message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, considering the inflation will favor you more in the later rounds.
I appreciate your offer, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the inflation will favor me more as the game progresses.
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need to ensure I get a reasonable amount too.  We both have to consider the inflation impact on our gains.
